nodes.text: Vel Jyc Boer was a master designer of an unknown species from Iokath who designed SCORPIO. Vel Jyc Boer felt the species the designer belonged to was in decline and only felt joy reminiscing of the designer's creations from long ago.
Vel Jyc Boer is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne in the codex entry 'History of Iokath: Entry 5.'
